column5: Our MSc Finance (Financial Sector Management) programme has been designed to help you advance your career in management within banks and other financial firms. By studying this programme, you will gain a deeper understanding of the principles, applications and context underlying decision making in financial sector management. As well as learning the scientific discipline and methodologies of finance, you will also discover the way financial markets and institutions actually work in a variety of contexts.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
